DOC.brief_summary: The goal project adapt evidence-based online weight management program integrate population management support primary care practice . Investigators conduct three-arm , cluster-randomized trial compare effectiveness 1 ) combine intervention ( online weight management program plus population management support ) 2 ) stand-alone online weight management program 3 ) usual care , among overweight obese primary care patient type 2 diabetes hypertension . The specific aim : 1. . To adapt online weight management program integrate population management support , incorporate input patient , primary care clinician , stakeholder ; afterward , investigator acquire feedback positive negative aspect intervention . b . To compare effectiveness combine intervention ( online weight management program plus population management support ) stand-alone online program usual care . Hypothesis 1 : The combine intervention lead great weight loss 12 month compare stand-alone online program usual care . 2 . To identify mediator combine intervention stand-alone online program . Hypothesis 2 : The effect combine intervention stand-alone online program weight loss mediate patient ' level engagement , change self-efficacy , change diet physical activity . 3 . To explore whether effectiveness combine intervention stand-alone weight management program varies patient characteristic . Hypothesis 3 : The intervention effective among patient young , white , high socioeconomic status , although population management strategy may help reduce difference .
DOC.brief_title: Integrating Online Weight Management With Primary Care Support
DOC.detailed_description: Focus Groups Key Informant Interviews : Focus group conduct 5 7 patient begin end study obtain feedback online program population health management support strategy . To eligible focus group , patient must Brigham Women 's Hospital ( BWH ) primary care clinician , BMI 27 34.9 kg/m2 , diagnosis type 2 diabetes hypertension . Key Informant Interviews conduct begin end study . To eligible , key informant must clinicians one participate BWH primary care practice . There total 165 clinician practice , include staff physician , resident fellow , nurse practitioner physician assistant . Approximately 7 clinician timepoint recruit key informant also ask complete electronic survey trial . After adapt online weight management program integrate population management support strategy base focus group key informant interview , investigator conduct three-arm cluster-randomized trial compare effectiveness combine intervention ( online weight management program plus population management support ) stand-alone online weight management program usual care . This pragmatic clinical trial conduct approximately 14 BWH primary care practice . To eligible trial , patient must upcoming schedule visit BWH primary care practice , BMI 27 39.9 kg/m2 enrollment , diagnosis type 2 diabetes hypertension . They also must age 20 70 ( inclusive ) enrollment , speak English Spanish , access Internet use computer , tablet , smart phone . Finally , patient must motivate lose weight . Investigators plan recruit total 840 patient study ( 280 per arm ) . Patients enroll trial attend regular primary care visit practice also complete survey e-mail , regular mail , phone .
DOC.criteria: 1. upcoming recent visit primary care practice affiliate Brigham Women 's Hospital 2. age 2070 3. diagnosis type 2 diabetes and/or hypertension 4 . BMI > = 27 < 40 kg/m2 5. motivate lose weight 6. valid email address access Internet use computer , tablet , smartphone 7 . English Spanishspeaking 1. insulin treatment diabetes 2 . MI , stroke , atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease ( ASCVD ) procedure last 6 month 3 . Unstable angina 4 . Currently pregnant plan become pregnant study period 5 . Currently lactate 5 . Has bariatric surgery planning bariatric surgery 6 . > 5 % weight loss last 6 month 7 . Severe psychiatric illness impair mental status 8 . Active diagnosed history and/or selfreported history eat disorder 9 . Selfreported average consumption > 14 alcoholic drinks/week 10 . Any serious medical condition would affect weight loss weight loss contraindicate , include active cancer ( exclude nonmelanoma skin cancer ) currently treat cancer , end stage renal disease ( ESRD ) dialysis , etc . 11 . On comfort care measure , hospice , nursing home 12 . Participating contraindicative research study 13 . Use prescription overthecounter weight loss medication allliquid diet program last 6 month currently 14 . Any medical contraindication weight loss physical activity , reason PCP delegate ( e.g. , LPN RN ) deem patient appropriate study
